au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: CRYOMAGNET_20m_srce60
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(19250,0) # Drive guide to ga config driveGuide(guideConfig.ga) # Drive entrance aperture to 150 (for ga) driveEntRotAp(60) sics.set('beamcenterx', 93.6977) sics.set('beamcenterz', 95.4997)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(15, 100) # Drive attenuator to 240 driveAtt(240)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(15, 0) driveBsz(255.0)
